text: Scope X « Send reminder email f there s an 12P with open amount and invit to pay generic email (order scenariol) has been sent before. Orly then we should send the reminder emal. « Ifthere s.an 2P 0, but the invite to pay generic emal (order scenariol) has ot been sent before, then don't send a reminder « Add a column to VAN_INVITETOPAYMAILTEMPLATE to specify the reminder email template that needs to be send « Update GETINVITETOPAYREMINDERLIST function n the VAN_PACKAGEINVITETOPAY « Update i2p service to use the new column created « Monitoring & logging Ave there any we need to monitor?.
